content: *one of our menagerie of amigurumi animals this little elephant is sure to be a favorite as seen in martha stewart living january 2010 lion brand yarn * skill level easy vanna s choice® article #860 1 ball *shown in silver blue* crochet hook - size g-6 4 mm split ring stitch markers 2 plastic safety eyes 9 mm diameter fiberfill stuffing some construction required to finish *lion brand yarns requires free registration and log-in to access patterns they are written in u s crochet terminology *
